long_description: Our REI Evaporator Snowboard bag features ventilated, padded protection to make traveling with and storing your snowboard simple and easy. Heavy-duty, tarpaulin-lined interior fits a mounted snowboard up to 165cm in length; bag is fully padded to offer excellent protection. Mesh panels and grommet openings promote air circulation and moisture drainage, helping combat edge rust. Webbing carry handles with padded hand strap ease transport. The REI Evaporator Snowboard bag is constructed with rugged Cordura(R) 600-denier polyester and beefy zippers to last many seasons.
short_description: Our REI Evaporator Snowboard bag features ventilated, padded protection to make traveling with and storing your snowboard simple and easy.
